column1: Metadata for Station: Includes metadata for a single station.

column4: Explanation
5 char name of station
name station site
longitude location [ degrees (hh.mmss) ]
latitude location [ degrees (hh.mmss) ]
z location [ m ]
any notes about station
datum for x, y, z location
reference ellipsoid
start time of data logging [ UTC ]
stop time of data logging  [ UTC ]
number of channels recording
list of channels recorded [ EX, EY, HX, HY, HZ | ...]
type of data collected [ BB | LP | AMT | Combo | ...]
declination value
declination units [ deg | radians | ...]
declination epoch
declination model
orientation coordinate system [ geographic | channel-measurement specific ]
compass, differential GPS, gyroscope, etc.
person(s) operating station
email of lead station operator
creation time of time series data for storing
name of software used to store time series
version of software used to store time series
author of software used to store time series
name of person or group creating archive data
name of organization or institution creating archive data
url of group creating archive data
email of person or group creating archive data
name of person or group submitting archive data
name of organization or institution submitting archive data
url of group submitting archive data
email of person or group submitting archive data
any notes on the history of the data
log of any changes made to time series data. (can this be automated?)
